msContents.summary: This copy of the Kāvyamālā. A collection of old and rare Sanskrit Kāvyas, Nātakas, Champūs, Bhānas, Prahasanas, Chhandas, Alankāras, &c. Part XI was digitized by the Digital Library of India in 2015.

origin.origDate: Printed at the Nirnaya Sagar Press.

body.head: asya kāvayasaikaṃ pustakaṃ kaśmīramahārājānāṃ jambūnagarasthapustakālayasthapustakataḥ pañcanadadeśīyaviśvavidyālayādhyakṣasŕīyutaḍāṃkṭarsṭain (M. A. Stein, Ph. D.) mahāśayair yathāpratyvatārya svapustakālayasthāpitam asmabhyaṃ kāvyamālārthaṃ dattam iti teṣāṃ mahāśayānām upakāraṃ varṇayitum akṣamās teṣāṃ dhanyavādaṃ prakāśayāmaḥ. asya ca pustakasyāntimapattrālābhena navanavatir eva ślokā upalabdhāḥ. ṭīkāpustake 'pi prarambhe madhye ca pattrāṇi samāptipattraṃ ca nopalabdhānīti kaver nāma kālaś ca na jñāyate.Khaḍgaśatakam |
(saṭīkam |)

lg.l:

kroḍeṣūtkṛttakaṇṭhotthitarudhirakaṇākīrṇakoṇaḥ kṛpāṇaḥ || 1 ||

khelāsaṃkhyeṣu khañjīkṛtaraṇarasikaḥ saṃmukhānāṃ khami(ni)ttram |

khelaty utkhātakhaḍgapratiyuvasu khanatkāravān asya khaḍgaḥ || 2 ||

lg.l:
jaṅghālo jaitrajanyājirabhuvi janayañ jantujāte jvarārtiṃ
jīvātur bāhujasya trijagati jayino dorbhujaṅgasya jihvā |

jyājānir vyāgrajāgradgajaradanaśilābhañjanājasrayogyo
jātajvālo jaṭāvān iha jayati jagajjitvaro 'muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 7 ||

div.p: jam iti || amuṣya khaḍga iha loke jayati | kiṃvidhaḥ | jaitraṃ jayaśīlaṃ yaj janyaṃ saṃgrāmas tasyājirabhuvi jaṅghālaḥ | satvara ity arthaḥ || "jaṅghālo 'tijave" ity amaraḥ | jantujāte prāṇimātre jvarārti jvarapīḍāṃ janayan | trijagati trailokye jayinaḥ parākramavato bāhujasya kṣattriyasya jīvātur jīvanauṣadham | "jīvātur jīvanauṣadham" ity amaraḥ | punaḥ kiṃvidhaḥ | athavā trijagati jayino dorbhujaṅgasya bāhusarpasya jihvā | jyājānir vasudhājāniḥ | "jāyāyā niṅ" | "vasudhāmaurvyor jyā" iti medinī | vyāgrāś ca jāgradgajaradanāś ca śilāś ca tāsāṃ bhañjanaṃ tatrājasraṃ yogyaḥ | jātā jvālā yasmin sa tathā | ata eva jaṭāvān | jagajjitvaraḥ ||

lg.l:
jhātkārāñ jaitrajanye jhagiti janayato janmikarṇajvarārtiṃ
jhañjhāvātānukārāñjhaṇajhaṇitijhaṇatkāriṇaḥ projjihānaḥ |

jhāṣāṅkīṃ tām avasthāṃ jhagiti ripujanaṃ grāhayan dhūrjaṭīṣṭāṃ
jhūrannamrāhiteṣūjjhitaraṇarabhasaṃ projjihīte 'sya khaḍgaḥ || 8 ||

div.p: jhād iti || asya khaḍga ujjhitaraṇarabhasaṃ saṃprās tādaraṃ yathā syāt tathā projjihīte gacchati | kiṃvidhaḥ | jaitrajanye jayaśīle saṃgrāme jhagiti jhātkārān anukaraṇaśabdān projjihānaḥ | kṛtavān ity arthaḥ | "ohāṅ gatau" | kiṃvidhāñ jhātkārān | jhañjhāvātānukārān savṛṣṭikavātasadṛśān | punaḥ kiṃvidhān | jhaṇajhaṇitijhaṇatkāriṇaḥ | kiṃkurvan san | jhāṣāṅkīṃ mānmathīm avasthām | bhasmarūpām ity arthaḥ | ripujanaṃ vairilokaṃ jhagiti śīghraṃ grāhayan | kiṃvidhām avasthām | dhūrjaṭeḥ śaṃbhor iṣṭām | namrā ye 'hitās teṣu jhūraṃl lajjan |

lg.l: ṭaṃkāroddhaṭṭitā yā jhaṭiti vighaṭayan koṭiśaś cāpayaṣṭīṣ ṭaṅko vidviḍgirīṇāṃ karaṭikaṭakaṭāhātikuṭṭāgrakoṭiḥ |

duṣkūṭair yaṣṭikūṭaiḥ kuṭukuṭilasaṭaiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ koṭisaṃkhyaiḥ
kheṭair durghāṭavāṭān pratibhaṭasubhaṭāṃṣ ṭīkate 'muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 9 ||

div.p: ṭam iti || amuṣya khaḍgaḥ pratibhaṭasubhaṭān pratipakṣavīrān drākśīghraṃ ṭīkate | tān prati gacchatīty arthaḥ | kiṃvidhaḥ | ṭaṃkāreṇa śabdenoddhaṭṭitāḥ prakaṭitāḥ [yāḥ] koṭiśo 'saṃkhyāś cāpayaṣṭīr jhaṭiti śīghraṃ vighaṭayan | punaḥ kiṃvidhaḥ | vidviṣāṃ girayas teṣāṃ ṭaṅko vidārakaḥ | punaḥ | karaṭino gajās teṣāṃ kaṭā gaṇḍasthalāni ta eva kaṭāhās tailādipākapātrāṇi teṣāṃ kuṭṭā piṣṭīkaraṇasamarthāgrakoṭir yasyeti | kiṃvidhān pratibhaṭasubhaṭān | duṣkūṭair duṣṭāgrair yaṣṭikūṭair yaṣṭisamūhaiḥ kaṭukuṭilasaṭaiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ phalakair durghāṭo vāṭo mārgo yeṣāṃ te | koṭisaṃkhyair iti viśeṣaṇaṃ triṣv api yojyam ||

lg.l:
ṭhātkārī kaṇṭhasīmanyatikaṭhinatare skandhapīṭhe kaṭhore
pṛṣṭhāṣṭhīlānukāre śaṭhakamaṭhapateḥ kumbhapṛṣṭhe 'pi caibhe |
drāgdrāghiṣṭhaḥ kaṭhoracchavijaraṭhataradyotasaṃghaṭṭamūrchatkoṣṭhāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ prakurvanripuśirasi luṭhaty etadīyaḥ "kṛpāṇaḥ" ity eva pāṭho bhavet.kuṭhāraḥ || 10 ||

div.p:
ṭhātkārīti || etadīyaḥ ‘kṛpāṇaḥ’ ity eva pāṭho bhavet.kuṭhāro ripuśirasi drāk śīghraṃ luṭhati | kiṃvidhaḥ | aibhe hastisaṃbandhini kaṇṭhasīmani kaṇṭhasamīpadeśe ṭhātkārī śabdakartā | kiṃvidhe kaṇṭhasīmani | atikaṭhinatare | punaḥ kiṃvidhaḥ | kaṭhore skandhapīṭhe ṭhātkārī | punaḥ kiṃvidhaḥ | aibhe kumbhapṛṣṭhe ṭhātkārī | kiṃvidhe kumbhapṛṣṭhe | śaṭhakamaṭhapater dhūrtakacchapasya | ‘śaṭho dhattūrake
dhūrte madhyasthapuruṣe 'lase’ iti mahīpaḥ | pṛṣṭhāṣṭhīlānukāre pṛṣṭhasyāṣṭhīlaṃ tattulye | drāghiṣṭho dīrghaḥ | kaṭhoracchaviḥ sūryas tasya jaraṭhataro yo dyotaḥ prakāśas tasya saṃghaṭṭas tena mūrchat_ dviguṇībhavan | ‘mūrcha’dhātor jakṣityāditve mānābhāvena numabhāvakathanam apramāṇam.‘jakṣityādayaḥ ṣaṭ’ i[ty abhyastasaṃjñāyāṃ ‘nābhyastāt-’ i]ti num na | kiṃ kurvan san | kāṣṭhā diśaḥ koṣṭhāḥ svādhīnāḥ prakurvan san | ‘koṣṭhaḥ kusūle cātmīye madhye kukṣer gṛhasya ca’ iti medinī ||

lg.l: ḍimbho daṇḍāyudhasya pradhanaghanataḍiccaṇḍadoḥ kuṇḍalīndrakṣveḍaḥ proddaṇḍadarpadviradananigaḍo ḍiṇḍimaḥ śauryabhartuḥ |
asya prācaṇḍyabhāṇḍaṃ ghṛtamadhupagaladgaṇḍavetaṇḍaśuṇḍākāṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ vitanvan yudhi dhutajaḍimā hiṇḍate maṇḍalāgraḥ || 11 ||

div.p: ḍimbha iti || asya maṇḍalāgro hiṇḍata itas tato gacchati | kiṃvidhaḥ | daṇḍāydhasya yamasya ḍimbhaḥ śiśuḥ | ‘potaḥ pāko 'rbhako ḍimbhaḥ’ ity amaraḥ | pradhanam eva saṃgrāma eva ghanataḍit tasyāś caṇḍador hastaḥ kuṇḍalīndraḥ śeṣas tat kṣveḍo garalam | ‘kṣveḍas tu garalaṃ viṣam’ ity amaraḥ | proddaṇḍo darpo yeṣāṃ te ye dviradanā gajās teṣāṃ nigaḍo 'ndukaḥ | śauryabhartur ḍiṇḍimaḥ sūcakavādyaviśeṣaḥ | pracaṇḍasya bhāvas tathā, tadbhāṇḍam adhikaraṇam | punaḥ kiṃvidhaḥ | yudhi saṃgrāme ghṛtā madhupā yais tair galantaḥ sravanto gaṇḍā yeṣāṃ te evaṃvidhā vetaṇḍā gajās teṣāṃ śuṇḍās tāsāṃ kāṇḍaṃ samūhaṃ khaṇḍaṃ cchedaṃ vitanvan vistārayan | dhuto jaḍimā yena saḥ ||

lg.l:
ḍhakkāsvārūḍhakīrtiprasṛtisuvijayaśrīvivoḍhā nirūḍho
vāḍhaṃ soḍhātigāḍhapraharaṇasamitau līḍhakoṣṇāstrasīdhuḥ |

rīḍhā gūḍhaprahartur draḍhimakulagṛhaṃ nyastaśastreṣu ṣaṇḍho
nirvyūḍhodgāḍhayuddhapratihatiṣu dṛḍhaṃ ḍhaukate 'muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 12 ||

div.p: ḍheti || amuṣya khaḍgo nirvyūḍhodgāḍhayuddhā vīrās teṣāṃ pratihatayo vraṇās tāsu dṛḍhaṃ ḍhaukate pravartate | kiṃvidhaḥ | ḍhakkayā vijayamardalena suṣṭu ārūḍhā yā kīrtis tasyāḥ prasṛtiḥ prasaras tasyāṃ suvijayaśrīs tasyā vivoḍhā | nirūḍhaḥ khyātaḥ | atigāḍhapraharaṇā yā samitiḥ saṃgrāmas tatra vāḍhaṃ soḍhā sahanaśīlaḥ | punaḥ kiṃvidhaḥ | līḍham āsvāditaṃ koṣṇaṃ kiṃcid uṣṇaṃ yad asraṃ tad eva sīdhur madyaṃ yena | gūḍhaprahartur aprakaṭamāraṇakartū rīḍhāvamānanā | draḍhimnaḥ kulagṛhaṃ dṛḍhatāyā adhiṣṭhānam | nyastaśastreṣu tyaktāyudheṣu ṣaṇḍho niḥsāraḥ ||

lg.l:
prāṇā darpasya pāṇī raṇaśamanaśiśoḥ kārmaṇaṃ dveṣaṇānāṃ
tūrṇaṃ sadvārabāṇavraṇakaraṇakṛtī kīrṇadurmarṣaṇārciḥ |

koṣṇadviṭśoṇitāktaḥ kharakiraṇaghṛṇiśreṇiśāṇo 'ruṇaśrīr
udgūrṇo vāraṇānāṃ gaṇam asṛṇi śṛṇāty asya tīkṣṇaḥ kṛpāṇaḥ || 13 ||

div.p: prāṇā iti || asya tīkṣṇaḥ kṛpāṇo vāraṇānāṃ gajānāṃ gaṇaṃ samūham asṛṇi sṛṇirahitaṃ yathā syāt tathā śṛṇāti | ‘śṝ hiṃsāyām’ | mārayatīty arthaḥ | kiṃvidhaḥ darpasya balasya prāṇāḥ | bahutvena nirdeśaḥ | raṇa eva śamanaśiśus tasya pāṇir hastaḥ | pāṇī raṇeti ‘ro rī’ iti ralope ‘ḍhralope’ iti dīrghaḥ | dveṣaṇānāṃ śatrūṇām | ‘dviṣaddveṣaṇadurhṛdaḥ’ ity amaraḥ | kārmaṇaṃ mūlakarma | tūrṇaṃ śīghraṃ sad yad vārabāṇaṃ kavacaṃ | ‘kañcuko vāraṇo 'strī’ ity amaraḥ | tatra vraṇakaraṇaṃ tatra kṛtī kuśalaḥ | kīrṇaṃ prasāritaṃ durmarṣaṇaṃ duḥsaham arcir yena | koṣṇaṃ yad dviṣatāṃ śoṇitaṃ raktaṃ tenāktaḥ siktaḥ | kharakiraṇaḥ śrīsūryas tasya ghṛṇayo mayūkhās teṣāṃ śreṇis tasyāḥ śāṇo gharṣanapāṣāṇaḥ | aruṇā śrīr yasya saḥ | udgūrṇa utthāpitaḥ ||

lg.l: tṛpyaddantikṣitīndraṃ taralatarataratpattibhaṅgaṃ vighūrṇattuṅgāśvāvartagartaṃ niśitatamamilatkuntasaṃtānacakram |

tvaṅgattīkṣṇāsitūrvattimim anatidalacchaktiśuktiṃ raṇābdhiṃ
tāras tūrṇaṃ titīrṣus tṛṇalavavad arīn asya khaḍgas tṛṇeḍhi || 14 ||

div.p: tṛpyad iti || asya khaḍgo 'rīñ śatrūṃs tṛnalavavat tṛṇeḍhi | mārayatīty arthaḥ | ‘tṛha hiṃsāyām’ | kiṃvidhaḥ | tūrṇaṃ śīghraṃ raṇābdhiṃ saṃgrāmasamudraṃ titīrṣus taraṇecchuḥ | ‘tṝ plavanataraṇayoḥ’ | tāra ujjvalaḥ | kiṃvidhaḥ raṇābdhiṃ | tṛpyato(nto) dantina eva kṣitīndrāḥ (tighrāḥ) parvato yasmiṃs tathā | taralatarā aticañcalās taranto ye pattayaḥ padātayas ta eva bhaṅgās taraṅgā yasmiṃs tam | vighūrṇantas tuṅgā ye 'śvās ta evāvartagartā yasmiṃs tam | … … … … | tvaṅgantas tīkṣṇā ye 'sayas ta eva tūrvattimayo yasminn iti tathā tam | anatidalacchaktaya eva śuktayo yasmiṃs tam ||

lg.l:
sthūlaṃ sthūlaṃ śvasadbhiḥ prathitapṛthupṛṣadvīkṣaṇais tīrthamātraṃ
saṃmanvānair apārthaṃ śithilaraṇakathair vepathuvyarthaśastraiḥ |

saṃprāptaiḥ sthāṇusaṃsthāṃ prathitapathacarais trastanetrātithitvaṃ
nītaḥ pratyarthisārthair vyathayati savidhasthān apīddho 'sya khaḍgaḥ || 15 ||

div.p:
sthūlam iti || asyeddhaḥ samṛddhaḥ khaḍgaḥ savidhasthān api samīpavartino 'pi vyathayati | kiṃvidhaḥ | pratyarthisārthaiḥ paripanthisamūhais trastāni yāni netrāṇi tatrātithitvaṃ nītaḥ | dṛṣṭa iti yāvat | kiṃvidhaiḥ pratyarthisārthaiḥ | sthūlaṃ sthūlaṃ dīrghaṃ dīrghaṃ śvasadbhiḥ | asahyatvāt | prathitapṛthu pṛṣanto bindavas tadyuktāni vīkṣaṇāni yeṣāṃ taiḥ | tīrthamātraṃ saṃmanvānaiḥ | apārthaṃ nirarthakaṃ śithilā raṇakathā yeṣāṃ taiḥ | vepathunā kampena vyarthāni śastrāṇi yeṣāṃ taiḥ | ata eva sthāṇusaṃsthāṃ saṃprāptaiḥ | prathito yaḥ panthās tatra carantīti carās
taiḥ | mahāpathas tu maraṇam iti ||

lg.l: dṛpyaddoḥkālakūṭadrumataruṇadalaṃ darpadantāvalendradrāghīyodānalekhā daradalitadalendīvaradroṇidehaḥ |
dīvyannaidāghama(mā)dhyaṃdinadivasamaṇidyotaduṣprekṣyadīpti dauḥsthityaṃ dīrghadīrghaṃ dadad arisudṛsāṃ dīpyate 'muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 16 ||

div.p: dṛpyad iti || amuṣya khaḍgo dīvya(pya)te krīḍate | kiṃvidhaḥ | dṛpyad yad dor bāhuḥ sa eva kālakūṭadrumo viṣatarus tasya taruṇadalaṃ navīnapatram | darpa [eva] dantāvalendro hastīndras tasya drāghīyo(yasī) dīrghā dānalekhā | daram īṣaddalitaṃ viśīrṇaṃ dalaṃ yasyaivaṃvidham indīvaraṃ tasya droṇir madhyabhāgas tadvad deho yasya sa tathā | śyāma iti yāvat | dīvyad yan naidāghama(mā)dhyaṃdinam uṣṇakālamadhyāhnaṃ tatra(hnabhavo) yo divasamaṇis tasya dyotaḥ prakāśas tena duṣprekṣyā dīptir yasya saḥ | arisudṛśāṃ vairistrīṇāṃ dīrghadīrgham atimahad dauḥsthyaṃ duḥsthasya bhāvas tathā tad dadat ||

lg.l:
dhairyasyādhārayaṣṭir dhṛtaviṣudhavadhūsādhvaso dhāma dhāmnāṃ
dhūmaḥ krodhānalasya pradhanarathavarasyoddhuro dhūrdharo 'yam |

dhīrodāttor dhvavāhā dharaṇidharadhṛtas tīkṣṇadhārādharo 'ddhā
dhīrānauddhatyabhājo raṇadharaṇicarānasya dhūnoti khaḍgaḥ || 17 ||

div.p: dhairyasyeti || asyāyaṃ khaḍga auddhatyabhājo raṇadharaṇicarān saṃgrāmabhūmigatān dhīrān dhūnoti kampayati | kiṃvidhaḥ | dhairyasya guṇasyādhārayaṣṭiḥ | dhṛtaṃ viṣudhavadhūnāṃ devastrīṇāṃ sādhvasaṃ yena saḥ | dhāmnāṃ tejasāṃ dhāmādhiṣṭhānam | krodha evānalas tasya dhūmaḥ | pradhanaṃ saṃgrāmas tad eva rathavaras tasyoddhuro dhūrdharo bhāradhartā | dhīrodāttaḥ puruṣaśreṣṭhas tasyordhvavāhā hastaḥ | ‘bhujā vāhā’ iti strītvena nirdeśaḥ | dhīrodāttalakṣaṇaṃ rasakalikāyām ― ‘caturdhā puruṣaḥ ― dhīrodātto dhīralalito dhīraśānto dhīroddhataś ceti | tatra ― kṛpāvān atigambhīro vinītaś cāvikatthanaḥ | dhīrodāttaḥ sa vijñeyo rāmo dāśarathir yathā ||’ iti | dharaṇidhareṇa rājñā dhṛtaḥ | tīkṣṇadhārādharaḥ | ‘addhā’ ity aṅgīkāro 'vyayam ||

lg.l:
nanānīke nanamrān nṛpatiṣu namayann ānatān ādhipatye
niḥsāpatnyaṃ nayan nānidhanam anibhṛtān apy alaṃ niścalatvam |

nirmathnan vairinārījananayanasarojanma dhārājalena
nyakkurvan niridhunīte pradhanacaranṛpān asya nṛtyan kṛpāṇaḥ || 18 ||

div.p:
nāneti || asya nṛtyan kṛpāṇaḥ pradhanacaranṛpān saṃgrāmasthitarājño(jo) nirdhunīte | nitarāṃ kampayatīty arthaḥ | kiṃ kurvan san | nānānīke 'nekasainye nṛpatiṣu madhye nanamrān uddhatān na
mayan asan | ānatān namrān ādhipatye niḥsāpatnyaṃ sapatnarahitaṃ yathā tathā anidhanaṃ maraṇāhityaṃ nayann iti na kiṃtu nayan | anibhṛtān aguptān alam atyarthaḥ niścalatvaṃ nirmathnan | dūrīkurvann ity arthaḥ | vairināryaḥ śatrustriyas tāsāṃ janaḥ samūhas tasya nayanasarojanma netrakamalam | jātyabhiprāyeṇaikavacanam | dhārājalena nyakkurvan ||
